name: Scarlet

ski.name: DOUBLE CHAKRAMS
desc: ACTIVE: Scarlet hurls a Chakram at a target direction, dealing physical damage to enemy units along a curved path and causing Aurablade for 5s while gaining vision on them. For each stack of Aurablade on an enemy unit, Scarlet gains 8% of damage bonus against it, stacking up to 3 times. Cast this ability again within 5s to hurl another Chakram with a different curve.

ski.name: FATE REVERSAL
desc: Scarlet gains bonus movement speed for 5s and gains 2 stacks of Reversal, which reflects incoming damage greater than 40 points back to their source 2 times. Each reflect deals physical damage based on 100% of Scarlet's total Attack Damage, and heals a bit of Health.

ski.name: SOUL STUN
desc: ACTIVE: Scarlet hurls a Chakram at the target enemy unit, dealing physical damage and causing Movement Slow by 60% for 1s. The Chakram also causes a stack of Aurablade and if the enemy unit is already debuffed with Aurablade, Soul Stun causes Stun for 1s.

ski.name: AURABLADE
desc: ACTIVE: Scarlet teleports to a target enemy unit debuffed with Aurablade, dealing physical damage and causing Silence for 1s. PASSIVE: Killing blows or assists reduce the cooldown on all of Scarlet's abilities by 20s.

story: As the sister of the lord of Wu Kingdom, this intelligent, smart and strong girl was a famous chivalrous woman at that time. She married Liu Bei, the lord of Shu Kingdom, to consolidate the alliance between Wu and Shu.
